questions.question: What might be a reason for a machine learning (ML) engineer to use Amazon SageMaker?
options: They want to build their ML models using their own infrastructure.
They want a prebuilt ML model with little to no configuration required.
They want to use Amazon Bedrock.
They want a single service to manage building, training, and deploying their ML models
correct_answers: They want a single service to manage building, training, and deploying their ML models
